subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Fourth-seeded Robin Soderling won his first Masters 1000 title by beating Gaël Monfils, 6-1, 7-6 (1), in the Paris Masters final.
snippet: Fourth-seeded Robin Soderling won his first Masters 1000 title by beating Gaël Monfils, 6-1, 7-6 (1), in the Paris Masters final.
